Posts.Content: blessedmom3 wrote: Hi, my sister suggested I come on here to ask a few questions. First, my heart and prayers go out to all of you going through breast cancer, and those who are worried, wondering, and waiting for results. All of you are remarkable. I pray that all of you get the answers you want and are healed. I have been having a horrible stabbing pain that comes and goes in my left breast where my nipple is. Even in the shower it hurts. No I am not pregnant, no its not any kind of pain I've ever had in my breast during PMS or menstrating or any other time. There is not any discoloration of the nipple or breast. I had a great mammogram early last summer. I did a self check today and felt nothing. It doesn't hurt to touch (except when shower water was hitting it), as much as these shooting sharp pains affect it. Am I worrying about nothing? Thanks, Kathy Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Stabbing pains in left breast ??? blessedmom3 B3tHAnY

Posts.Content: Mar 11, 2007 06:21AM blessedmom3 wrote: The thing is I don't press on it and it hurts, it just shoots pain on its own. Thanks for your replies.
